import "./DateTime.css"; import BackArrow from '../../../assets/back-arrow.svg' import ContinueArrow from '../../../assets/continue-arrow.svg' function DateTime(props) { const changeDayHandler = (value) =>{ props.changeSelectedDay(value) props.changeSelectedHour("") } return (
{/*

{props.movie.title}

*/}

Horror, drama
1h 30m

Select a day

{changeDayHandler("24 june 2021")}}>24 june 2021

{changeDayHandler("24 august 2021")}}>24 august 2021

{changeDayHandler("24 december 2021")}}>24 december 2021

Select an hour

{props.changeSelectedHour("23:40")}}>23:40

{props.changeSelectedHour("23:41")}}>23:41

{props.changeSelectedHour("23:42")}}>23:42

); } export default DateTime;
